content.text: Hi there!
Hey!
How are you today?
Good! Just got back from working out.
Nice! I'm trying to lose weight so I should probably get back to working out myself.
Yeah, it's definitely worth it. I feel so much better when I work out.
I bet! I just have to find the time to do it.
Yeah, that can be tough. I usually try to work out in the morning before work so I don't have to worry about it later.
That's a good idea! I might have to try that.
It works for me! What kind of music do you like to listen to when you work out?
I like to listen to upbeat music that gets me pumped up.
Me too! I like listening to EDM or hip hop.
Those are both good choices! I also like listening to rock music sometimes.
Rock music is good too! I like to listen to it when I'm feeling angry or stressed.
Yeah, that makes sense. It's a good way to let off steam.
Definitely! So, what are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. How about you?
I'm just getting ready to go out with some friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! Have a good time!
Thanks, I will
